item.title: The Tarot tells no fortunes.
item.description:
The Tarot tells no fortunes.

,

The cards allow us to use both logical and intuitive pattern recognition to aid our understanding of the world around us. Change is the only constant, and Tarot is a classification system of an archetypal change process. In learning the cards one is able to better discern the natural, cyclical changes that constantly effect our lives.

item.title: Pragmatic Tarot Reference Spread
item.description:
Pragmatic Tarot Reference Spread

,,

The Tarot is the best reference material for learning Tarot. To use the tarot, you need to trust your intuition, and you can’t do that if you keep checking a book.

item.title: The Pragmatic Celtic Cross - Version 1
item.description:
The Pragmatic Celtic Cross - Version 1

,,

The basic idea of Pragmatic Tarot is that there is only one sequence. The same sequence is reflected in the positions of the Celtic Cross. Position one is has the meaning of… one. Position two is number two. Card three has the same meaning as number three. Notice a pattern?
